coreAttributes.name: micro bikini top
coreAttributes.description: A triangle-shaped micro bikini top. It uses loose strings tied around the neck and back to keep it in place and has only just enough material to cover the wearer's nipples.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the skimpy fabric of the micro bikini top over [npc.her] [npc.nipples] before tying up the strings at [npc.her] back.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the skimpy fabric of the micro bikini top over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples] before tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the skimpy fabric of the micro bikini top over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples] before roughly tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc.her] micro bikini top and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] micro bikini top and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] micro bikini top and [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
